description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. In this game you wake up in a forest, with nothing but your knowledge of zombie killing, and your bare hands! You must collect materials to build shelter before night falls, and zombies attack. Build epic fortresses, construct weapons, and survive for as long as you can! Invite a friend to help you in your journey, and kill twice as many zombies... together!
